questions.question: What are your business hours?
questions.answer: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM Eastern Time.

questions.question: How can I reset my password?
questions.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your email.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer refunds within 30 days of purchase if you're not satisfied with our product.

questions.question: How do I contact customer support?
questions.answer: You can contact our customer support team by emailing support@example.com or calling 1-800-123-4567.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
